title: Update a Customer's Credit Limit
description: A long-standing customer with a good payment history requests an increase to their credit limit to support their growing business.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current credit limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the customer's account details.

tasks.description: Review the customer's payment history and sales volume over the last two years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has a perfect payment history and their order volume has doubled.

tasks.description: Approve the request and increase the customer's credit limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the credit limit in the system.
